ValidationRule.description: SE-1227 - If the ERP status is in an acknowledged status (anything beyond a JDE status of 540), and the user attempts to change the part order status to "Canceled" a validation error is presented.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c ), VALUE(Last_Status__c) > 540, ISPICKVAL( HRCSVC_Order_Line_Item_Status__c , "Canceled"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "HRCSVC_Parts_Order_Line_Item" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Order Line Item is in an ERP status that does not allow canceling.
